Sentencas: In the present study, the ionic conductivity of the 14 mol%-yttria stabilized zirconia single crystal subjected to the tensile or compressive stress was examined at various temperatures.
Titulo: Effect of uniaxial stress on ionic conductivity of 14 mol%-yttria-stabilized zirconia single crystal

Sentencas: The conductivity was increased by the tensile stress and the improvement in the conductivity was higher at the lower temperature and also for the specimen with the < 100 > orientation.
Titulo: Effect of uniaxial stress on ionic conductivity of 14 mol%-yttria-stabilized zirconia single crystal

Sentencas: On the other hand, the conductivity was decreased by the compressive stress.
Titulo: Effect of uniaxial stress on ionic conductivity of 14 mol%-yttria-stabilized zirconia single crystal

Sentencas: The change by the compressive stress was higher at the lower temperature, but it was generally smaller than that in the tensile test.
Titulo: Effect of uniaxial stress on ionic conductivity of 14 mol%-yttria-stabilized zirconia single crystal

Sentencas: The maximum improvement achieved by applying the tensile stress was about 18% at 850 K in the present study.
Titulo: Effect of uniaxial stress on ionic conductivity of 14 mol%-yttria-stabilized zirconia single crystal

Sentencas: The present experimental results qualitatively agreed with the molecular dynamics simulations on the oxygen diffusion.
Titulo: Effect of uniaxial stress on ionic conductivity of 14 mol%-yttria-stabilized zirconia single crystal

Sentencas: The oxygen displacement in the fluorite lattice caused by the applied stress could be attributed to the change in the conductivity.
Titulo: Effect of uniaxial stress on ionic conductivity of 14 mol%-yttria-stabilized zirconia single crystal
Effect of uniaxial stress on ionic conductivity of 14 mol%-yttria-stabilized zirconia single crystal
